page.title: 09Employment
page.content:
From a survey of parents of children at Wybunbury School the following statistics were drawn:
Only 7 people work in the village and its area.They are employed in the local shop and pub,in the quarry or on farms.
Many more work outside the area.17 work in Crewe,9 in Nantwich (the 2 closest towns).Further afield, 3 work in Hanley (the Potteries),1 in Manchester and 1 even works in Sheffield.8 people travel for a living and one person is even a sailor on the Irish sea.
These results prove that Wybunbury is a dormitory town.
